name: My Little Restaurant
description:
Welcome to My Little Restaurant. Get in here and turn this place around, from a small diner to a crowded eating palace. Help Mikey and Annie seat the guests, collect orders, deliver meals and earn money. Every once in a while jump into the kitchen and prepare some tasty burgers or perfect sushi. You won’t find a better deal at any other place.

Game Features:

• Five Restaurant Themes: American Diner, Japanese Bar, Ancient Palace, Picnic Fun and Space Lunchroom
• Two extra cooking games: Burgers for the Chef and SushiMaster Challenge
• Thirty-three unique levels
• Extra features and power-ups
• Up to 40 guests at a time
